幨字的基本解释

幨
chān
帷幔，如车帷、帐帷等。
皱起。

幨
chàn
　ㄔㄢˋ
衣襟。

幨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chān］
［《廣韻》處占切，平鹽，昌。］
(1)车帷。
(2)床帐。
(3)皱起。
[②]［chàn］
［《廣韻》昌豔切，去豔，昌。］
衣襟。

幨字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【巾字部】　幨； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页337第09
【廣韻】【集韻】處占切【韻會】【正韻】蚩占切，?音襜。【玉篇】帷也。【集韻】車襜。【韻會】以帷障車旁如裳，爲容飾，其上有蓋，四旁垂而下，謂之幨。【周禮·春官】王后之五路，重翟厭翟安車，皆有容蓋。【註】容謂幨車，山東謂之裳幃，或曰潼容。　又【韻會】或作裧。【儀禮·士昏禮】婦車有裧。【註】裧，車裳帷。　又絕也。【周禮·冬官考工記】弓人爲弓筋之所由，幨恆由此作。【註】幨謂絕起也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【正韻】?昌豔切，音䠨。【廣韻】披衣。【管子·揆度篇】列大夫豹幨。【註】襟謂之幨。　【集韻】亦作??。

考證：〔【周禮·春官】【註】客爲幨車。〕　謹照原文爲改謂。〔【管子·侯度篇】列大夫豹幨。〕　謹照原文侯改揆。
幨字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
幨字的起名意思

暂无。

curtain in carriage
Basic explanation of words
curtain in carriage
chān
Curtains, such as car curtains, tents, etc.
Wrinkled.
curtain in carriage
chàn
ㄔ ㄢ
Placket.
curtain in carriage
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chān］
["Guangyun" Chu Zhanqi, Pingyan, Chang. ]
(1) Car curtain.
(2) Bed netting.
(3) Wrinkles.
[②]［chàn］
["Guang Yun" Chang Yan cut, go Yan, Chang. ]
Placket.
curtain in carriage
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Scarf Character Department] 　幨; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 337 09
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] Chu Zhanqi [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Chi Zhanqi,? Yin Xun. [Jade articles] Hanging also. [Ji Yun] Che Yu. 【Yunhui】The curtain wall is like a dress next to the car, as the decoration, with a cover on it, hanging down on all sides, it is called the sorrow. 【Zhou Li·Chunguan】The fifth queen of the road, heavy Zhaiwei Zhaian car, all have a cover. [Note] Rong is called Naoche, Shandong is called Shangdang, or Tongrong.　[Rhyme will] or make a 裧. 【Rituals·Shiyun Li】Women's cars have a chase. 【Note】裧, car clothes hanging.　Also. [Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji] The archer is the cause of the bowstring, and Tuo Heng made it. [Note] It is said to be absolutely nothing.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun]? Chang Yan cut, the sound is different. [Guang Yun] Cloth. [Guan Zi·Kidu Chapter] Doctor Leopard Tuo. [Note] The plaque is called the sorrow.　【Jiyun】also used as??. Textual research: [[Zhou Li·Chun Guan] [Note] The guest is a car. 〕 　 I would like to change the name according to the original text. 〔【Tu Zi·Hou Du】Leo doctor Leopard Tuo. 〕 　 I would like to follow the original Hou Gaikui.

Old glyph
curtain in carriage
Name meaning
Nothing.
chān
I сущ.
1) балдахин, полог (кровати); боковые занавеси (экипажа)
幨车 * экипаж с занавесями (для дам)
2) см. 襜 (передник, фартук)
3) * щит (от стрел)
II гл.
* разорваться, лопнуть, выйти из строя (напр. о жилах катапульты)
